question: i have little cracks on my penis. right on the cut on circumcision. the skin around that place get really dry and then cracks. i see a doctor and he said its something call "lynch plume" or something like that not very sure about the spelling. and there is no medication for that. should go away over time. its been almost a year now. but its just not going away and very uncomfortable.i use neosporin and skin get softer and it gets little better. please tell me what should do i do?thanks
title: dry and crack skin on penis
